name: Debris (itch) (FATE rev:eng)
description:
Breakout... of the lies.

Simple? Use your paddle to breakout... but something is wrong! The more you breakout the harder becomes, until you inevitably face the truth... or do you?

A fun yet innovative idea, inception, recursion.... and something we all love, a game made entirely out of cubes! ok one sphere and some text!

Do you like the idea? Let me know!

Also check out our 4D strategy gave and support us because you love weird ideas

https://fategame.itch.io/buy

https://gum.co/fate

https://twitter.com/fateapps

UPDATE: now with fix for fast paddle on windows! use -/= to slow/speed paddle (some mouse settings are too sensitive)
